title: Disco Night at Ruby Lounge with Dancin' Machine!
desc: Joey's Nightlife and the Ruby Lounge present Dancin' Machine, the hottest 70's Disco Band in the country, right here in Totowa NJ! ?Dig out your Bell Bottoms and dust off your Platform shoes because Dancin' Machine is coming to Party! This 11 piece powerhouse band lays it down the groove like no other. Experience 70's Disco exactly as it was back in the day. Live, Love, Dance, Dancin' Machine!
